mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replies (reply_no, reply_content, user_no, board_no, updateDate, replyDate ) VALUES (replies_seq.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{userNo}, #{boardNo}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE replies SET reply_content=#{replyContent}, updateDate= SYSDATE WHERE reply_no=#{replyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT a.reply_no, a.board_no, a.reply_content, a.user_no, a.replydate, TO_CHAR(a.updatedate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS wr_date, b.nickname FROM replies a ,users b WHERE a.board_no = #{boardNo} AND a.user_no = b.user_no ORDER BY a.reply_no
select count(replyNo) from replies where boardNo = #{boardNo}
